name: Finger Soccer 2016 - Slide soccer simulation game for real challengers and soccer stars
name_original: Finger Soccer 2016 - Slide soccer simulation game for real challengers and soccer stars
description:
Finger soccer is beautiful single player game that gives you ultimate mobile soccer experience. Choose your country, Set your team’s formation, challenge your opponent and win BIG MATCHES. 

Game has two modes
-Quick Match: Quick match allows you to challenge a team randomly from soccer playing nations.
-Tournament: Tournament is based on knockout system. It comprises of four rounds. You have to win all matches in order to qualify for finals.
